issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Add TRUNC function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15663](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15663). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns date truncated to the unit specified by the format. Supported formats: MONTH/MON/MM, YEAR/YYYY/YY. Example: trunc('2015-03-17', 'MM') = 2015-03-01.
